com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Interface AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    AppPublics

    public static interface AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider
    States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide several AppPublics.BroadcastListener.

    As soon as a Smartable entity implements this interface, it is able to register several wrapped BroadcastReceiver instances through the concept of AppPublics.BroadcastListener: this is handy, because it enables to aggregate several independent reusable AppPublics.BroadcastListener at the same time, and because the framework takes care of unregistering them when the embedding entity is destroyed.

    This interface has been split into two distinct methods, one for determining how many broadcast listeners the entity exposes, one for getting each individual AppPublics.BroadcastListener. This split is mostly due to performance issues.

    Since:
    2010.11.07
    See Also:
    Smarted#registerBroadcastListeners(BroadcastListener[]), AppPublics.BroadcastListener, AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppPublics.BroadcastListener getBroadcastListener(int index)
      This method is bound to be invoked successfully by the framework with a index argument ranging from 0 to getBroadcastListenersCount() - 1.
      int getBroadcastListenersCount()
      This method will be invoked by the framework, so that it knows how many AppPublics.BroadcastListener it exposes.

    • Method Detail

      • getBroadcastListenersCount

        int getBroadcastListenersCount()
        This method will be invoked by the framework, so that it knows how many AppPublics.BroadcastListener it exposes.
        Returns:
        the number of AppPublics.BroadcastListener which are supported
        See Also:
        getBroadcastListener(int)

      • getBroadcastListener

        AppPublics.BroadcastListener getBroadcastListener(int index)
        This method is bound to be invoked successfully by the framework with a index argument ranging from 0 to getBroadcastListenersCount() - 1. The method implementation is responsible for returning all the AppPublics.BroadcastListener that this entity is supposed to expose.
        Parameters:
        the - index of the AppPublics.BroadcastListener to return
        Returns:
        the AppPublics.BroadcastListener for the provided index parameter; it is not allowed to be null
        See Also:
        getBroadcastListenersCount()
